product_name: The North Face Mt. Tam Quarter-Zip Sweater - Men's
long_description: Perfect for strolling cobblestone streets or taking a quick hike into the hills, the Mt. Tam Quarter-Zip sweater from The North Face is stylish and comfortable. Soft cotton/wool blend is naturally breathable and antimicrobial; nylon adds durability. Sporty quarter-zip neck with fleece-lined collar lets you adjust your style and comfort. Raglan sleeves enhance fit, allowing freedom of movement. Machine wash.
short_description: Perfect for strolling cobblestone streets or taking a quick hike into the hills, the Mt. Tam Quarter-Zip sweater from The North Face is stylish and comfortable.
